MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St. Andrews. Engineers are continuing to make repairs to a faulty underground cable on South Street and due to the complex repairs, it is taking us longer than expected and we still expect all power to be restored by 10pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:53 PM on Thursday, 22 October 2020.
